name: Chip (itch) (Samson-Dev)
description:
You play as chip, a microchip frantically rushing through your home computer to save it from the virus.  You must rush your way through the levels while dodging shots and solving puzzles as the clock ticks down(WIP).  

This game was created for Mini Jam 15 following the theme of technology.  The limitation for the jam was to only use a predefined colour palette.

I'd appreciate any suggestions and or feedback.  I hope you enjoy what is there, I will continue to develop and update the game in the future.
